Description.Text:
Centrally located on Barcelona's famous Las Ramblas Boulevard, Citadines Ramblas Barcelona offers 24-hour reception and is surrounded by many restaurants, bars and shops. Plaza Catalunya Metro Station is just 100 metres away. The impressive Boqueria Market is 2 minutes' walk from Citadines Ramblas.
All air-conditioned studios and apartments at Citadines Ramblas Barcelona feature a kitchen with a microwave, fridge and dishwasher. Bathrooms are equipped with hairdryers and all rooms have a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. You will also enjoy a free internet access in rooms and a free wifi in hallways.
House linen is provided and accommodation is cleaned once a week free of charge. An additional cleaning service is available on request for an extra cost.
Bicycle and car rental can be arranged for guests at Citadines. Luggage storage is also available.

In the heart of Las Ramblas, one of the most vibrant area in the city this apartment complex is close to many historical sights such as Plaza catalunya, Picasso museum, Miro museum or the gothic cathedral. Plaza Catalunya subway station is 2-minutes walk and the beach is less than 1km away.

Studio 2 pers - The Studios are one room spaces of about 28 sqm, provided either with double beds or twin bed, with view to the famous Ramblas, or to the recently discovered roman rests. All studios have a fully equipped kitchen, with refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, glassware, crockery, cutlery and utensils, as well as a complete bathroom, with bath tub, hairdryer, towels and toiletries. Besides of the free broadband internet access, you will find LCD Televisions, with international cable channels. The studios are all provided with safe box, air conditioning, iron and ironing board, and additional services to make your stay as pleasant as possible.
One bedroom apartment - The Apartments are two room spaces, of about 40 sq with a bedroom with double bed, as well as a spacious living room, provided with sofa bed. All Apartments have a fully equipped kitchen, with refrigerator, microwave, dishwasher, glassware, crockery, cutlery and utensils, as well as a complete bathroom, with bath-tub, hairdryer, towels and toiletries. Besides of the free broadband internet access, you will find LCD Televisions, with international cable channels. All Apartments are provided with safe box, air conditioning, iron and ironing board, and additional services to make your stay as pleasant as possible
